name: BuzzHDQ
overview:
BuzzHDQ is a boutique consultancy that teams up with app developers to take the next step beyond that great app idea, hot design and months of development. BuzzHDQ partners with you to fire up a smart app strategy, set in motion app marketing that wins consumers, and in the process, build a better product and relationship with your app fans.

Creating buzz is my business. That’s what I do best. Creating apps is your business. I work closely with my clients to create a solid strategy at app concept and development phases and to put in place a game-changing marketing plan for your app starting from pre-launch and working through new plans as your app and audience matures. I keep a healthy flow of continuous buzz going around your app.

Services include: Social Media Audit, App Strategy, Pricing Strategy, Distribution Strategy, Dev Concept, Testing and Usability Review, Marketing Plan, Consultancy, Interactive Campaigns & Promotions, Events, Social Content, Press Release, Engagement Plans, Listening & Monitoring, and Training.

Connect with your local and global fans to successfully promote your app!
